data.title: bd-339: Add .critignore support for excluding files from reviews
data.description: Adds .critignore file support using gitignore syntax. .crit/ is always ignored, .beads/ excluded by default. Shows helpful error when all files are ignored.

data.reason: No security concerns. Hard-coded ignore patterns (.crit/, .beads/) correctly cannot be bypassed via .critignore negation rules since the prefix check runs first. The ignore crate is well-audited (ripgrep). No path traversal, injection, or DoS vectors.
